attributes.action: completely re vamp the current use of speed & cctv cameras. The current situation is frankly abismal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The way cameras are used at present is disgracefull. For instance why should fines & penalty points be the same on a deserted road at 5am as at 5pm? If there are no pedestrians or traffic, what justification is there? None, other than making money. As a temporary goodwill gesture, at least reduce the fines & points, from say midnight until 6am A.S.A.P.
